doctor.name: Dr. ABM Zafar Sadik
doctor.specialty: Piles, Colorectal, Laparoscopic & General Specialist Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. ABM Zafar Sadik is a Colorectal Surgeon in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Surgery at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra. Practicing hour of Dr. ABM Zafar Sadik at Popular Diagnostic Center, Bogra is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).
